timeline.bodyText: If track file format is not set KML format is used by default, why not KMZ?
timeline.author: rgmf

replies.bodyText:
I thought of privacy first, but from a usability perspective that might be weird.
So, let's move to KMZ with all the data for this case.
Thanks.
And I will move the default definition into the values/settings.xml.
This is how it was done for all other preferences and consistency is king :)
replies.author: dennisguse

timeline.message:
Settings: added default sharing track file format.
Fixes #225.
Export/Import: TrackFileFormat is now selected via settings only.

Export: do not show progress of exported TrackPoints.
Only the overall number of tracks is shown now (similar to import).

Export: do not show progress of exported TrackPoints.
Only the overall number of tracks is shown now (similar to import).
